actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning February 15, 1976, as "My America Week."

summary.text: Provides that in commemoration of "My America-Yesterday, Today, Tommorrow", a Bicentennial observance involving the participation by American schoolchildren in competitions including essays, drawings, and other graphic and plastic arts, the President is requested to designate the week of February 15, 1976, as "My America Week".

titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning February 15, 1976, as "My America Week."
